lrc.lyric:
[00:02.048]What would I do without your smart mouth
[00:05.875]Drawing me in, and you kicking me out
[00:09.466]Got my head spinning, no kidding, I can't pin you down
[00:17.055]What's going on in that beautiful mind
[00:20.738]I'm on your magical mystery ride
[00:24.487]And I'm so dizzy, don't know what hit me, but I'll be alright
[00:32.768]My head's under water
[00:36.425]But I'm breathing fine
[00:40.448]You're crazy and I'm out of my mind
[00:47.958]'Cause all of me
[00:50.766]Loves all of you
[00:54.606]Love your curves and all your edges
[00:58.276]All your perfect imperfections
[01:02.025]Give your all to me
[01:05.786]I'll give my all to you
[01:09.548]You're my end and my beginning
[01:13.297]Even when I lose I'm winning
[01:16.967]'Cause I give you all of me
[01:22.682]Say something, I'm givingup on you
[01:24.613]And you give me all, all of you, oh
[01:30.158]I'll be the one, if you want me to
[01:34.755]And I am feeling so small
[01:42.011]It was over my head
[01:45.603]I know nothing at all
[01:49.745]And I will stumble and fall
[01:56.915]I'm still learning to love
[02:00.593]Just starting to crawl
[02:05.790]Say something, I'm giving up on you
[02:13.113]I’m sorry that I couldn’t get to you
[02:19.567]'Cause all of me
[02:22.558]Loves all of you
[02:26.319]Love your curves and all your edges
[02:30.146]All your perfect imperfections
[02:33.895]Give your all to me
[02:37.487]I'll give my all to you
[02:41.510]You're my end and my beginning
[02:45.167]Even when I lose I'm winning
[02:48.843]'Cause I give you all of me
[02:54.481]Say something, I'm giving up on you
[02:56.466]And you give me all, all of you, oh
[03:02.108]I'll be the one, if you want me to
[03:03.698]Give me all of you
[03:06.657]Cards on the table, we're both showing hearts
[03:14.249]Risking it all, though it's hard
[03:23.967]'Cause all of me
[03:26.876]Loves all of you
[03:31.147]Love your curves and all your edges
[03:35.235]All your perfect imperfections
[03:39.519]Give your all to me
[03:43.516]I'll give my all to you
[03:47.787]You're my end and my beginning
[03:51.869]Even when I lose I'm winning
[03:55.898]'Cause I give you all, all of me
[03:58.210]Say something, I'm givingup on you
[04:02.182]I'll be the one, if you want me to
[04:04.007]And you give me all, all of you, oh
[04:06.556]Say something, I'm givingup on you
[04:14.738]Say something, I'm givingup on you
[04:23.120]I'll be the one, if you want me to

tlyric.lyric:
[00:02.048]没有你的蜜语甜言，我该怎么办
[00:05.875]你时而热情似火，时而冷若冰霜
[00:09.466]让我天旋地转，说真的，让你表态很难
[00:17.055]你的心底有什么打算
[00:20.738]我已搭上你的神秘之旅
[00:24.487]虽然眼花缭乱，不知什么触动我心，但我仍安然无恙
[00:32.768]看似进退维谷
[00:36.425]可我活得舒服
[00:40.448]你不可理喻,我更是撞向你去
[00:47.958]因为我的一切
[00:50.766]爱上了你的一切
[00:54.606]你的轮廓，你的曲线
[00:58.276]还有你完美的缺陷
[01:02.025]你的一切交给我
[01:05.786]我的一切也交给你
[01:09.548]你是我的终点与起点
[01:13.297]就算失败我也当胜利
[01:16.967]因为我给了你所有，所有的我
[01:22.682]能否说些什么，我快要放弃你了 。
[01:24.613]你给了我所有的你
[01:30.158]只要你说，我便去做。 
[01:34.755]我感觉自己是如此的渺小。
[01:42.011]你充斥着我的脑海
[01:45.603]可我却不知如何去做。
[01:49.745]我可能还会摔倒。
[01:56.915]我还在学着去爱，
[02:00.593]才开始迈出第一步。
[02:05.790]能否说些什么，我快要放弃你了。
[02:13.113]我很抱歉，我无法给你你想要的一切。
[02:19.567]因为我的一切
[02:22.558]爱上了你的一切
[02:26.319]你的轮廓，你的曲线
[02:30.146]还有你完美的缺陷

[02:37.487]我的一切也交给你

[02:45.167]就算失败我也当胜利
[02:48.843]因为我给了你所有，所有的我

[02:56.466]而你给了我所有，所有的你
[03:02.108]只要你说，我便去做。
[03:03.698]给我你的一切
